name: Powie's pLinks PagePeeker
author: Thomas Ehrhardt

sections.description:
This Plugin shows a List from a Link Category on a Page using the [plinks] shortcode. You can provide the category as a parameter to choose which list is displayed.
To view a single website preview image, provided by PagePeeker you can use the [pagepeeker] shortcode.
For Thumbnails to work you have to register a free account and add your domain at http://pagepeeker.com/signup/free/
Needs reactivation of the original WordPress Link Manager.

Demos

Demo 1
Demo 2
Demo 3

Including:

  • PagePeeker Preview Images
  • Shortcode: [pagepeeker]
  • Link list from links manager
  • Shortcode [plinks]

Support

Use our Support Forum @ powie.de for fast help.

Translations

Many thanks to our translators –
sr_RS: borisad@webhostinghub.com

Remove plugin

  1. Deactivate plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Delete plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.installation:
1. Upload this Plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust settings
sections.faq:
Link Manger is not available

Since WordPress 3.5 and above the link manager is disabled by default on all new installations.
You can reactivate it by installing this plugin: Link-Manager

How can I support you?

Post a comment on powie.de Forum

What is the plugin page?

Powie’s Flying Dev Blog

Where do I post my feedback?

Post it at my Forum: powie.de Forum

I have an API Key but PagePeeker Screenshots arent displayd

Make sure your Sites Domain is validated in your PagePeeker Account at pagepeeker.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 (08.01.2019)

  • API Support. No need to query the API Key. Make sure your Site is authed.

1.0.1 (07.01.2019)

  • API Support. If you have an API KEY, SSL is used

1.0.0 (03.01.2017)

  • WordPress 4.7 compatibility
  • Show some Love

0.9.9 (20.06.2016)

  • Added API Info

0.9.8 (26.12.2015)

  • WordPress 4.4 compatibility
  • debug mode fixes

0.9.7 (30.06.2014)

  • Added sr_RS translation

0.9.6 (22.01.2014)

  • Activation Info for Link Manager

0.9.5 (20.01.2013)

  • Added a plinks.css style to have a clean list in all themes

0.9.4 (15.01.2013)

  • New PagePeeker V2 API used

0.9.3 (07.02.2013)

  • Localization ready
  • de_DE Language
  • new pagepeeker shortcode

0.9.2 (04.11.2011)

  • Icon Fix

0.9.1 (04.11.2011)

  • Websnapr removed -> PagePeeker used

0.9.0 (19.02.2011)

  • first version with all required stuff by me

short_description: Displays a linklist at a page with the [plinks] shortcode with PagePeeker preview images. Provides a [pagepeeker] shortcode
